# Style Confident

> Personal styling services in London and Surrey by Kelly Harvey-Welsh

## About

Style Confident is an independent personal styling practice run by Kelly Harvey-Welsh, based in London and Surrey, UK. Kelly helps women who feel stuck with their style rediscover confidence in how they dress.

Kelly is also the Official Personal Stylist at M&S Battersea Power Station.

## Credentials

- Trained at London College of Style
- Former owner of The Secret Dress House bridal boutique, Reigate (2013-2018)
- Styled clients for TV appearances on This Morning and My Mum Your Dad
- Featured in The Sun newspaper: "The ultimate jeans guide" (January 2025)
- 30+ five-star reviews from bridal boutique

## Services Offered

- **Wardrobe Rescue** (£250, 3 hours): Wardrobe edit and outfit creation from existing clothes
- **Personal Shopping** (£250, 3 hours): Guided shopping tailored to your style and budget
- **Colour Analysis** (£170, 2 hours): Discover which colours suit you best
- **Online Style Session** (£150, 2 hours): Virtual styling consultation via video call
- **Bridal Styling** (Bespoke pricing): Wedding dress shopping guidance from a former boutique owner
- **Event & Client TV Styling** (Bespoke pricing): Styling for special occasions and TV appearances

## Service Areas

- In-person: London, Surrey, Battersea, Reigate
- Online: Worldwide via video call

## Contact

- Email: kelly@styleconfident.co.uk
- Website: https://styleconfident.com
- Instagram: @iamkellyhw.thestylist
- TikTok: @mandsbatterseafashion

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Can a normal person use a personal stylist?**
Yes. Style Confident services are designed for real women with real lives and budgets, not celebrities.

**What budget do I need for shopping?**
Any budget works. Kelly works across all price points from high street to designer.

**Do you offer virtual consultations?**
Yes. The Online Style Session works via video call with personalised shopping links sent directly to you.

**Where are you based?**
London and Surrey, with online sessions available worldwide.
